author: craigmcc
msg: Remove bad file with an incorrect filename on many platforms.

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove files that prevent a CVS update from succeeding on a Windows
platform ("SaveGTest" and "SaveGtest" are the same file on Windows).

author: craigmcc
msg: Update the "if" logic in this test so that it will return an intelligible
error report (rather than throwing NullPointerException) if the servlet
container incorrectly returns null from ServletRequest.getCharacterEncoding().

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct a typo on the request URI for the negative test on
ServletRequest.getCharacterEncoding().  The actual test servlet was never
being invoked, which led to an incorrect FAIL result.
